generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, which is the primary surface for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are visible walking on a paved area adjacent to the road, separated by a curb, which is a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story structures line both sides of the street, including commercial and residential buildings.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: Traffic light fixtures are mounted on poles at the intersection.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a stop sign and directional signs, mounted on poles.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are present along the sides of the road and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a pale sky, partially obscured by tree branches.
- person: Two individuals are walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- car: A silver car is visible driving in the right lane of the road.
- truck: A white truck is visible parked on the left side of the road in the distance.
- fence: A fence is visible along the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
